snippet.title: Timberborn Gameplay Trailer: "Beavers thrive!"
snippet.description:
🌳 Wishlist Timberborn on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1062090/Timberborn

Humans are gone. Will your society of lumberpunk beavers do better? Timberborn is a city-building game featuring ingenious animals, vertical architecture, and river control (with dams and dynamite!). Releases in Steam Early Access (PC, Mac) in Q1 2021, closed beta is available now!

The game will be available in English, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, German, French, Russian, Simplified Chinese, and Polish – check the Steam page linked above for a translated description!

-- Features --
🧨 River control with dams and dynamite
🪓 Timber-tech machinery
🏡 Vertical settlements
⛰️ Destructible terrain
🌇 Day and night cycle
🥕 Wellbeing mechanics
🦦 Unique beaver societies*
🗾 Map editor
...and more!
(*) Yeah, we know, that emoji depicts an otter.

-- Find us on: --
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1062090/Timberborn
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Timberborn
Official Discord server: http://discord.gg/timberborn

For media & content creators: https://timberborn.mechanistry.com/presskit
How to join the closed beta: http://bit.ly/TimberbornBeta
